= SWI-Prolog 2-Way interface to .NET =


== Introduction ==

Based on the SwiPlCS by Uwe Lesta, SwiCLI is a module that works on both Unix/Mac and Windows to provide SWI-Prolog full control of the Common Language Infrastructure.  


== Details ==

  * *cli_new(+Type,+Param,-Object)* Create a new system object 
  * Headings, paragraphs, and lists
  * Automatic links to other wiki pages
